name: arrow
description: Ability to define a lambda expression using a fat arrow.

examples.title: Lambda
examples.code:
<cfscript>
areaFunc = ( w, l ) => { 
                area = w * l;
                return area;
              };
writeOutput("Area of width of 3 and length of 21 = " & areaFunc(3,21));
</cfscript>
examples.result: Area of width of 3 and length of 21 = 63
